entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
